headline: PulteGroup (PHM) Is Considered a Good Investment by Brokers: Is That True?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for PulteGroup (PHM) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: PulteGroup, Inc. (PHM) is Attracting Investor Attention: Here is What You Should Know
summary: PulteGroup (PHM) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Therefore, it is wise to be aware of the facts that can impact the stock's prospects.
